mapper.update: update l_city set cityid=cityid ,citycode=#{citycode} ,cityname=#{cityname} ,orderno=#{orderno} ,longitude=#{longitude} ,latitude=#{latitude} where cityid=#{cityid}

update l_city set cityid=cityid ,citycode=#{citycode} ,cityname=#{cityname} ,orderno=#{orderno} ,longitude=#{longitude} ,latitude=#{latitude} where 1=1 and cityid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and cityid =#{Where_Id} and cityid=#{Where_cityid} and citycode=#{Where_citycode} and cityname=#{Where_cityname} and orderno=#{Where_orderno} and longitude=#{Where_longitude} and latitude=#{Where_latitude}
mapper.select: select t.cityid "cityid", t.citycode "citycode", t.cityname "cityname", t.orderno "orderno", t.longitude "longitude", t.latitude "latitude" from l_city t where cityid=#{cityid}

select t.cityid "cityid", t.citycode "citycode", t.cityname "cityname", t.orderno "orderno", t.longitude "longitude", t.latitude "latitude" from l_city t where 1=1 and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.citycode=#{citycode} and t.cityname=#{cityname} and t.orderno=#{orderno} and t.longitude=#{longitude} and t.latitude=#{latitude}

select t.cityid "cityid", t.citycode "citycode", t.cityname "cityname", t.orderno "orderno", t.longitude "longitude", t.latitude "latitude" from l_city t where 1=1 and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.citycode=#{citycode} and t.cityname=#{cityname} and t.orderno=#{orderno} and t.longitude=#{longitude} and t.latitude=#{latitude}
mapper.delete: delete from l_city where 1=1 and cityid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and cityid =#{Where_Id} and cityid=#{Where_cityid} and citycode=#{Where_citycode} and cityname=#{Where_cityname} and orderno=#{Where_orderno} and longitude=#{Where_longitude} and latitude=#{Where_latitude}
mapper.select: select t.cityid "cityid", t.citycode "citycode", t.cityname "cityname", t.orderno "orderno", t.longitude "longitude", t.latitude "latitude" from l_city t where 1=1 and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.citycode=#{citycode} and t.cityname=#{cityname} and t.orderno=#{orderno} and t.longitude=#{longitude} and t.latitude=#{latitude}

select count(*) from l_city t where 1=1 and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.cityid!=#{NoId} and t.citycode=#{citycode} and t.cityname=#{cityname} and t.orderno=#{orderno} and t.longitude=#{longitude} and t.latitude=#{latitude}
